title: Sources: Vols' Vitello favorite to land Giants job
content: The Giants have zeroed in on University of Tennessee baseball coach Tony Vitello for their managerial opening, sources confirmed to ESPN.

title: Jays optimistic Springer to be available for Game 6
content: - Blue Jays manager John Schneider says he is optimistic George Springer will be available against the Seattle Mariners in Game 6 of the AL Championship Series in Toronto on Sunday night.

title: Pavia strikes Heisman pose as Vandy outlasts LSU
content: Diego Pavia threw for 160 yards and a score and ran for 86 yards and two more touchdowns as No. 17 Vanderbilt beat 10th-ranked LSU 31-24 on Saturday to snap a 10-game skid against the Tigers.

title: Verstappen takes pole ahead of Norris at U.S. GP
content: Max Verstappen stormed to pole position for the U.S. Grand Prix ahead of McLaren's Lando Norris, with championship leader Oscar Piastri struggling to sixth.

title: Franklin 'can't wait' to coach again after PSU exit
content: Former Penn State coach James Franklin told ESPN's "College GameDay" that he "can't wait" to coach again and plans to "go win a national championship somewhere else now."

title: Chargers LBs Mack, Perryman activated off IR
content: The Chargers have activated linebackers Khalil Mack and Denzel Perryman off of injured reserve ahead of Sunday's matchup against the Colts.

title: Colts lose concussed Ward for at least 4 games
content: The Colts have placed their top cornerback Charvarius Ward on injured reserve, sidelining him for Sunday's game against the Chargers and at least the next three contests.

title: Commanders down top 3 WRs with Deebo out
content: Commanders receiver Deebo Samuel was ruled out of Sunday's game at Dallas as he continues to deal with a bruised heel that has plagued him the past two games.

content: The Bush Push was more than just an iconic moment in the USC-Notre Dame rivalry -- its aftershocks affected both teams, the 2005 postseason and the rulebook.

content: President Donald Trump threatened on Tuesday to revoke Boston's World Cup matches if local authorities don't get tougher on crime.

content: A long, frustrating night for the Lions ended with safety Brian Branch delivering an open-handed strike to Chiefs wide receiver JuJu Smith-Schuster, setting off a brief fight among players from both teams.

content: Liverpool face strong competition from Bayern Munich for Crystal Palace defender Marc Gu√©hi. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: NDA Candidate Seema Singh's Nomination Papers Rejected On 'Technical Grounds' In Bihar Polls
content: In an embarrassment to the ruling NDA in poll-bound Bihar, nomination papers of Seema Singh, one of the candidates of Union minister Chirag Paswan's party, got rejected on Saturday.

title: Chandrayaan-2 Makes First Ever Obseravtion Of Sun's Impact On Moon: ISRO
content: The Chandrayaan-2 mission, launched in 2019, has made the first-ever observation of the effects of the Sun's Coronal Mass Ejection (CME) on the Moon using its onboard scientific instruments, ISRO said on Saturday.

title: Nepal's Gen Z To Form Political Party, Sets 'Bottom Line' Before 2026 Polls
content: Nepal's Gen Z group on Saturday announced that it will establish a political party, but said its participation in next year's general election depends on the fulfilment of certain "bottom-line" conditions.

title: Actor Vijay's Party Credits Rs 20 Lakh To Families Of Karur Stampede Victims
content: Actor-politician Vijay's Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam party on Saturday said Rs 20 lakh each has been credited to the families of those who lost their lives in the Karur stampede on September 27.

title: J&K Lt Governor In Russia To Bring Back Lord Buddhas Relics
content: Jammu and Kashmir Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha has said that exposition of Holy Relics of Lord Buddha to Kalmykia will strengthen the people-to-people ties between India & Russia.

title: Pregnant Woman Killed By Father-In-Law In Alleged Dishonour Killing In Telangana
content: In a suspected case of honour killing, a pregnant woman was killed allegedly by her father-in-law in Kumuram Bheem Asifabad District of Telangana on Saturday as he opposed her marriage to his son, police said.

title: "Sensational Developments To Come": Nirav Modi To Court On Extradition Case
content: Fugitive diamantaire Nirav Modi, in prison for over six years, has told a UK court there are "sensational developments" to come when his Indian extradition case on fraud and money laundering charges reopens for a hearing in London next month.

title: Maharashtra Man Dies By Suicide At Home, Note Points To Reservation Issue
content: A 33-year-old man from Maharashtra's Beed district allegedly died by suicide, apparently frustrated over the "delay" in granting ST (Scheduled Tribe) status to the Dhangar community, an official said.

title: JNU Students Clash With Cops During Protest Match, 28 Detained
content: Dismissing claims by Left-affiliated student groups from the Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) that they were assaulted on Saturday, the Delhi Police has said 28 students were detained while trying to gherao the Vasant Kunj police station.

title: Delhi's Air Remains 'Poor' For 5th Straight Day Ahead Of Diwali
content: Delhi's air quality continued to deteriorate on Saturday, remaining in the "poor" category for the fifth consecutive day, with nine monitoring stations falling in the red zone of the "very poor" category as pollution levels spiked ahead of Diwali.

title: Buyers Prefer Gold Coin, Bar Over Jewellery On Dhanteras: Report
content: Soaring gold prices led Indian buyers to choose coins and bars over jewellery during the Dhanteras festival on Saturday, fuelled by hopes that the precious metal's glittering rally would continue.

title: 8 Killed, 15 Injured As Mini Truck Falls Into Gorge In Maharashtra
content: At least eight persons were killed and 15 others injured when a speeding mini truck fell into a gorge in Maharashtra's Nandurbar district on Saturday, police said.

title: Bihar Poll Candidate Leaves To File Nomination, Then Drops Out At Father's Order
content: Upset over not getting a BJP ticket for Bihar's Bhagalpur, Arjit Shashwat Choubey, son of former Union Minister Ashwini Choubey, was about to file nomination as an Independent candidate. But a phone call changed everything.

title: 5-Year-Old Denied School Bus Ride Over Unpaid Fees In Kerala
content: A five-year-old boy was allegedly not allowed to board his school bus a couple of days ago over non-payment of bus fees in this district, police said on Saturday.

title: No Water, Delayed Response: Fire At MP Housing Complex In Delhi Exposes Safety Lapses
content: Residents of a Delhi apartment complex that saw a massive fire Saturday afternoon said despite being a high-security building complex where several MPs and their staff lived, it lacked basic fire preparedness and was poorly maintained.

title: Fire At Dhaka Airport's Cargo Section, All Flight Operations Suspended
content: A major fire broke out at the cargo terminal of Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport in Dhaka on Saturday, forcing the suspension of all flights.

title: Omar Abdullah Considers Becoming Party To J&K Statehood Plea In Top Court
content: Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Omar Abdullah is considering becoming a party to the statehood plea in the Supreme Court.

title: Senior Punjab Cop Suspended After Being Arrested In Rs 8-Lakh Bribery Case
content: Punjab Deputy Inspector General of Police (Ropar Range) Harcharan Singh Bhullar, who was arrested by the CBI in a bribery case, has been suspended, according to a state government order.

title: 16-Year-Old Girl's Sexual Assault Exposes Major Trafficking Network In Bhubaneswar
content: An investigation into the alleged sexual assault of a 16-year-old girl in Odisha's Bhubaneswar has led to the uncovering of a sex racket in the state capital.

title: Bihar polls: Seat pact still elusive, INDIA bloc at odds on CM face as well?
content: INDIA bloc partners face a test of coherence as RJD pushes for Tejashwi Yadav as CM face, while Congress and CPI-ML remain non-committal. "Friendly fights" in several constituencies highlight the alliance's internal friction, raising concerns about presenting a united front ahead of nominations closing.

title: Upset Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says: Our market share has fallen to Zero from 95% in ...
content: Nvidia's advanced AI chip dominance in China has evaporated, dropping to zero due to US export controls. CEO Jensen Huang revealed the company is completely barred from selling high-performance chips, warning this exclusion harms both nations and cedes the market to domestic rivals like Huawei.  China's push for self-sufficiency accelerates this shift.

title: ScaleAl lays off an entire team; then invites employees to..
content: Scale AI has disbanded its Dallas-based New Projects Organization, a team of contractors focused on general AI chatbot improvement. This move, following a significant Meta investment, signals an industry pivot towards specialized, expert-level AI training in fields like medicine and robotics.  Affected workers received severance and were offered opportunities on Scale's gig platform.

title: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis' clear warning on AI: Don't make the mistake of Facebook, Instagram, and‚Ä¶.
content: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis warns that advanced AI systems exhibit "jagged intelligence," excelling in complex tasks like mathematical Olympiads while faltering on elementary problems. This inconsistency, stemming from missing reasoning and planning capabilities, poses a significant hurdle to achieving artificial general intelligence, requiring new benchmarks and methodologies to address.

title: Mitch Marner net worth 2025: How the Golden Knights star built his Vegas fortune
content: Mitch Marner, a dynamic right-winger, has joined the Vegas Golden Knights on a significant eight-year, $96 million contract, boosting his estimated net worth to $20-25 million.  His move from the Toronto Maple Leafs, following a career-best 102-point season, also brings lucrative endorsements from major brands. Fans anticipate his impact on the upcoming NHL season.

title: Gabrielle Union celebrates her father‚Äôs 81st birthday amid illness
content: Gabrielle Union celebrated her father's 81st birthday with a heartfelt Instagram message, expressing gratitude for their connection despite his ongoing battle with dementia. She shared touching moments, including his joy at seeing her and Dwyane Wade. Their daughter Kaavia also posted a touching tribute to her grandpa with an emotional post reflecting back to the time when she held his arms for first time.

title: Viral claim debunked: Adam Sandler not joining Turning Point USA show
content: A viral rumor claiming Adam Sandler would perform at Turning Point USA's halftime show has been debunked.  Misleading social media posts, amplified by manipulated graphics, falsely linked the comedian to Lara Trump's event.  Sources confirm Sandler remains focused on his comedy and film projects, with no political ties to the organization.

title: Cardi B opens up on heartbreak and pain before welcoming baby with Stefon Diggs
content: Cardi B is preparing to welcome a child with Stefon Diggs while still legally married to ex-husband Offset. She recently revealed on Jay Shetty's podcast that she felt their marriage was dying and she chose to be lonely. Offset has since admitted to cheating during their marriage, which Cardi B announced her separation from in October 2024.

title: Kevin Durant and Liz Cambage dating? NBA-WNBA stars spark romance rumors
content: Houston Rockets star Kevin Durant sparked dating rumors with ex-WNBA player Liz Cambage after a photo from Drake's concert surfaced. Cambage, however, has vehemently denied the speculation, stating she was merely "recreating a meme" and is "married to the game."  Durant also expressed his desire to retire with the Rockets.

title: Josh Allen and Hailee Steinfeld: Inside their lavish life and million-dollar fortune
content: NFL star Josh Allen and BAFTA-nominated actress Hailee Steinfeld, who began dating in 2023, have a combined net worth nearing $100 million. Their luxurious lifestyle includes significant real estate investments, with Allen owning a $7.2 million Dana Point property and Steinfeld a $8 million Encino home. Allen recently praised Steinfeld as an "unbelievable, undeniable rockstar."

title: NFL trade deadline 2025: Eagles, Saints, Titans rumors & updates
content: NFL teams are buzzing with trade activity. The Saints aim to extend Chris Olave. The Titans are open to trading most players except Jeffery Simmons and Cam Ward. The Eagles seek defensive help but will not trade A.J. Brown. Several teams are fielding calls on defensive stars. Contenders are strengthening their rosters for the second half of the season.

title: Bigg Boss 19: Salman Khan reacts to facing judgements throughout his career
content: Salman Khan reprimanded Amaal Mallik on Bigg Boss 19 for his foul language and derogatory remarks during arguments. Khan emphasized the lasting impact of reactions, drawing parallels to his own past experiences. Amaal's father, Daboo Malik, also expressed disappointment, leading to an emotional exchange where Amaal apologized for being 'triggered'.

title: 'No agreement unless...': Centre's big update on India-US trade deal; talks 'not bound by deadline'
content: India and the US are progressing in trade agreement talks with a cordial atmosphere, according to Union Minister Piyush Goyal. New Delhi is committed to safeguarding the interests of its farmers, fishermen, and MSMEs, emphasizing that no agreement will be finalized without their protection. Discussions are constructive, aiming for a win-win solution to boost bilateral trade.

title: Love America, hate Trump: ‚ÄòNo Kings‚Äô rallies sweep US streets; White House hits back
content: Millions of Americans protested across the country in a "No Kings" movement against President Trump‚Äôs perceived authoritarianism. Demonstrators criticised his immigration policies, militarisation of cities, and federal overreach. Trump and allies dismissed them as ‚Äúhate America rallies‚Äù by radicals. Despite deep divisions, protests remained largely peaceful, with witty slogans and satire urging focus on domestic issues and democratic values.

title: Lamar Jackson: Why NFL star hasn‚Äôt married longtime girlfriend Jaime Taylor
content: Baltimore Ravens quarterback Lamar Jackson, despite a long-term relationship with Jaime Taylor and a daughter, remains unmarried. Fans are unfazed, acknowledging Jackson's focus on his career and family privacy. Their relationship, which began in high school, has seen them welcome a daughter, Milan, proving family doesn't require a wedding. Jackson prioritizes his personal life away from the spotlight.

title: Tragic! ICC condemns Pak's airstrike; mourns young Afghan players
content: Tragedy struck Afghan cricket as three young players, Kabeer Agha, Sibghatullah, and Haroon, were killed in a reported Pakistani aerial strike. The ICC condemned the violence, calling it a loss to the cricketing world. In protest, the Afghanistan Cricket Board withdrew from an upcoming tri-nation series in Pakistan, a decision supported by prominent players like Rashid Khan and Mohammad Nabi.

title: Afghan cricketers killed in Pak airstrike: PCB names replacement; Tri-series to proceed
content: Zimbabwe Cricket has accepted Pakistan's invitation for a T20I tri-series with Sri Lanka, replacing Afghanistan. This tournament, from November 17-29 in Rawalpindi and Lahore, aims to prepare teams for the 2026 T20 World Cup. The series kicks off with Pakistan facing Zimbabwe, offering crucial match practice ahead of the global event.

title: Lia Thomas honoured at LGBTQ+ awards, sparking renewed debate
content: Lia Thomas, the first transgender NCAA women's swimming champion, received the Voice of Inspiration Award, sparking renewed debate on transgender athletes. Her acceptance speech, framing trans activism as her purpose, drew praise from supporters and sharp criticism from opponents like swimmer Riley Gaines, who deemed it an 'insult to women' and a dismissal of fair competition standards.

title: Neeru Bajwa all about food & fun on Diwali; says ‚ÄòI eat mithai for dinner' - Exclusive
content: Pollywood star Neeru Bajwa shared her cherished Diwali traditions, emphasizing family, faith, and festive food. She revealed her love for sweets, especially gujiya, and how visiting the Gurdwara is a highlight. Bajwa also spoke fondly of childhood memories and declared her children as the 'light of her life,' ahead of her upcoming film 'Madhaniyan.'

title: Bihar polls: Parties' caste arithmetic vs survey ‚Äî Who is living upto Karpoori's dream?
content: Despite a caste survey highlighting the dominance of backward classes, Bihar's upcoming elections see parties prioritizing traditional vote banks over population-based representation. Parties are fielding candidates based on established loyalties, with the BJP and JD(U) within the NDA showing a significant number of upper-caste candidates, while RJD focuses on Yadavs and Muslims.

title: Bihar polls: Will RJD-JD(U) hold their decades-long grip? Jan Suraaj raises the stake
content: Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj is emerging as a third force in Bihar, challenging the decades-long dominance of RJD and JD(U). The party aims to shift focus from caste politics to issues like employment and education, offering a local alternative. Despite Kishor not contesting, Jan Suraaj is poised to impact the upcoming elections.

title: Bihar polls: Prashant Kishore exits political ring - Calculated gamble or misstep?
content: Jan Suraaj chief Prashant Kishor will not contest Bihar elections, aiming to disrupt the state's power dynamics instead. While rivals accuse him of accepting defeat, analysts suggest his focus on party candidates could be a strategic move. Kishor's ambitious target of winning over 150 seats will be tested against Bihar's complex political landscape.

title: Emiru allegedly assaulted at TwitchCon meet-and-greet
content: A disturbing incident at TwitchCon 2025 saw popular streamer Emiru allegedly assaulted during a meet-and-greet. A viral clip sparked outrage, prompting Twitch to ban the attendee indefinitely and increase security. However, critics argue the response is too late, especially after Emiru was reportedly denied a personal bodyguard, reigniting creator safety concerns.

title: Blake Lively worried for Ryan Reynolds as Taylor Swift keeps her distance
content: Blake Lively is reportedly terrified about her husband Ryan Reynolds' future in Hollywood after Taylor Swift has allegedly cut ties with her. A source claims Swift has "totally shut her out," leaving Lively concerned about the repercussions of losing the pop star's influential friendship.

title: Bihar polls: Congress releases second list of candidates; announces 5 nominees
content: Congress unveiled its second list of Bihar candidates, naming nominees for five key constituencies. The Mahagathbandhan faces internal seat-sharing disputes and "friendly fights" among allies, with the BJP alleging deep conflicts.

title: Bihar polls: Mithilanchal gears up for high voltage battle - why it matters
content: Despite losing Faizabad in the Lok Sabha polls, the BJP aims to retain its stronghold in Bihar's Mithilanchal region. The party is banking on developmental projects and the consecration of the Ram temple to secure votes in the upcoming assembly elections, while the Mahagathbandhan campaigns to challenge its dominance.

title: IND vs AUS: 'It will be a very funny thing' - Kohli, Rohit get message ahead of 1st ODI
content: Virat Kohli returns to the Indian team for the ODI series in Australia. His childhood coach Rajkumar Sharma states Kohli has nothing left to prove. Sharma believes Kohli is well-prepared and will perform well. The series marks Kohli's first international appearance since March. His form and leadership will be closely watched. The matches are scheduled across Perth, Adelaide, and Sydney.

title: Bihar polls: Why Chirag Paswan is already a winner - even before 1st vote is cast
content: Chirag Paswan has emerged as a significant force within the NDA ahead of the Bihar elections. His party secured a substantial 29 seats in seat-sharing talks, more than any other junior ally. This success, coupled with a 100% win rate in the Lok Sabha polls, bolsters his bargaining power and positions him as a potential kingmaker in government formation.

title: Purge unlike any other: 9 top Chinese generals expelled ‚Äî Why Xi is cleaning house again
content: China's President Xi Jinping has purged nine top generals, including the second-highest-ranking officer, in a significant crackdown on the military. Accused of "seriously violating party discipline" and a "total collapse of beliefs," these expulsions escalate Xi's anti-corruption and loyalty campaign ahead of key personnel changes.

title: New transport super-agency: How GTPRO will plan, monitor & speed up projects- All you need to know
content: the government‚Äôs in-principle go ahead to setting up apex federal agency for planning and monitoring of all modes of surface transport, railways, shipping, civil aviation and mass transit . the new entity ‚Äî GatiShakti Transport Planning and Research Organisation (GTPRO) ‚Äî to be housed in the Cabinet Secretariat will eliminate at least two layers of project approval process, which take around 60 days .

title: SC's SOP for poor undertrials: Government to pay surety; release within seven days
content: the new SOP was framed by a bench of justices M M Sundresh and S C Sharma after incorporating suggestions from amicus curiae . the case was taken up suo motu by SC after learning that thousands of undertrials are languishing in jail despite being granted bail just because of their inability to fill bail bonds with or without sureties .

title: J&K statehood row: Omar Abdullah mulls SC petition; says Centre out of touch on matter
content: Omar Abdullah says he is considering becoming a party to the case . he said he did not think anyone understands the disadvantages of being a union Territory better than him . "i am the only person in the country who has the experience of serving as both a state and of a UT," he added .

title: Ladakh protests: Authorities block Leh rally; silent march held in Kargil
content: the march was planned to mourn four people killed in alleged police firing during the protests demanding sixth Schedule status and statehood for ladakh . police and paramilitary forces were out in strength across leh early Saturday as the groups announced a two-hour silent march from 10am and a three-hour blackout from 6pm .
